channel.title: Personal on Infinite Walk
channel.description: Recent content in Personal on Infinite Walk

item.title: All or Nothing
item.description: I do agree with Elle. No matter how stubborn we are, sometimes the world won’t just wheel on our terms. We can’t always say, “its my way or highway”. Its not all or nothing all the time. There are times when we need to compromise. Download this poem as image, text, or pdf.

item.title: Certainly
item.description: I love this line a lot. Because confidence has been something I used to struggle with. Once, a friend of mine once told me, my confidence is not that they will like me, my confidence is, I will be fine even if they don’t. Download this poem as image, text, or pdf.

item.title: Journey Wisely
item.description: My mentor & partner-in-crime Shree Pragada, one of best human beings to talk to about existence of this world, metaphysical literature, and the God, often tells me, “this world doesn’t need our help. we are here to serve a purpose. We have got this one life to realize that one purpose, and fulfill it. This world is perfect just the way it is.” It made me realize we are insignificant in this universe.

item.title: Sing to Me
item.description: Love is all we got. Download this poem as image, text, or pdf.
